scripts.setup: cargo install soroban-cli --debug --version 21.0.0-rc.1 --root node_modules/.bin && cargo install loam-cli --debug --root ./node_modules/.bin && cd node_modules/.bin && ln -s ./bin/* .
scripts.soroban:show-xlm: soroban lab token id --asset native --network testnet
scripts.smartdeploy:publish: cd contract && smartdeploy call smartdeploy --fee 10000 -- publish --contract-name ziriz-nft --wasm-file-path target/loam/ziriz_series.wasm --author default
scripts.smartdeploy:deploy: cd contract && smartdeploy call smartdeploy --fee 10000 -- publish --contract-name ziriz-nft --wasm-file-path target/loam/ziriz_series.wasm--author default
scripts.contract:link: read -p "Enter contract id: " contract && cd contract && soroban contract bindings typescript --network testnet --contract-id $contract --output-dir ./packages/contract-client
scripts.contract:deploy-testnet: soroban contract deploy --wasm target/loam/ziriz_series.wasm --source alice --network testnet
